title: cannot render_script
body:
Hi, 
I can successfully run all scripts in [unity_demo.ipynb](https://github.com/xavierpuigf/virtualhome/blob/master/demo/unity_demo.ipynb) **except lines containing `render_script`.**
I always get the following error when I try to `render_script`:
```
------------------------------------------------------------
UnityEngineException       Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-33-b0a2016e0ac0> in <module>()
     13                                       image_width=512, image_height=320,
     14                                       file_name_prefix='milk',
---> 15                                       camera_mode='FIRST_PERSON')

~/Source/virtualhome/simulation/unity_simulator/comm_unity.py in render_script(self, script, randomize_execution, random_seed, processing_time_limit, skip_execution, find_solution, output_folder, file_name_prefix, frame_rate, image_synthesis, capture_screenshot, save_pose_data, image_width, image_height, gen_vid, save_scene_states, character_resource, camera_mode)
    141                   'image_width': image_width, 'image_height': image_height}
    142         response = self.post_command({'id': str(time.time()), 'action': 'render_script',
--> 143                                       'stringParams': [json.dumps(params)] + script})
    144         if response['success']:
    145             if gen_vid and len(image_synthesis) > 0:

~/Source/virtualhome/simulation/unity_simulator/comm_unity.py in post_command(self, request_dict)
     19             resp = requests.post(self._address, json=request_dict)
     20             if resp.status_code != requests.codes.ok:
---> 21                 raise UnityEngineException(resp.status_code, resp.json())
     22             return resp.json()
     23         except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:

UnityEngineException: (408, {'id': '1561703596.590129', 'success': False, 'message': 'Timeout', 'value': 0, 'message_list': None})
```
I'm using Ubuntu 18.04 remotely.
I have also tried docker. I can run [generate_snapshot.py](https://github.com/xavierpuigf/virtualhome/blob/master/demo/generate_snapshot.py) inside or outside the docker and successfully get all the snapshots.
But I always get the same error when running [generate_video.py](https://github.com/xavierpuigf/virtualhome/blob/master/demo/generate_video.py), always stuck at `render_script` function.
Could you please help me?
